section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains the social workers placement of the patient.

stentry.p: Contains the codes that identify the placement made based on Problem Discharge/Planning. 'I' FOR INPATIENT; 'O' FOR OTHER; 'N' FOR NO PLACEMENT MADE;

Contains the codes that identify the disposition of the patient if placement was made. '1' FOR CNHC; '2' FOR CNH-Non VA; '3' FOR Domiciliary; '4' FOR NHCU; '5' FOR Own Home; '6' FOR RCH; '7' FOR Other;
